mapper.insert: insert into T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK ( GROUP_NO, MEMBER_NO, M_DATE, M_MEMO, M_MONEY, M_LEFT, M_RIGHT, M_TYPE ) values ( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{mDate}, #{mMemo}, #{mMoney}, #{mLeft}, #{mRight}, #{mType} )
mapper.select: select M_NO as mNo, GROUP_NO as groupNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, M_DATE as mDate, M_MEMO as mMemo, M_MONEY as mMoney, M_LEFT as mLeft, M_RIGHT as mRight, reg_date as regDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK order by M_NO desc limit 1

select M_NO as mNo, GROUP_NO as groupNo, MEMBER_NO as memberNo, M_DATE as mDate, M_MEMO as mMemo, M_MONEY as mMoney, M_LEFT as mLeft, M_RIGHT as mRight, reg_date as regDate from T_WITH_STUDYGROUP_MONEYBOOK where group_no = #{groupNo} order by m_no desc limit 0, 19
